amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 118-7 to require the Attorney General to submit an annual report to Congress evaluating the compliance of the Federal Government with the Protecting Free Speech from Government Interference Act. This amendment provides transparency and insight into any potential violations of the Act by government agencies or employees, and sunsets after 10 years.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Clyde amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Clyde.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Clyde amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
